title: The Confession Protocols
outcome: Halden’s fractured voice is broadcast across Stenograd, revealing he set the city’s crisis in motion as an unsanctioned experiment. The city wrestles with public guilt and trauma as factions splinter over the true purpose and legacy of the BCI.

events.description: All screens across Stenograd flash with Halden's disjointed confessions, pieced together from years of speech logs and surveillance. Shockwaves spread as cryptic statements hint at engineered social stress.
Council session footage from 2023 leaks, showing Halden warning, 'If trust breaks, let them see the cracks.' Council members are accused of ignoring clear risks.
Community gatherings and broadcast debates erupt, citizens struggling with shame and anger. Former BCI-favored individuals are confronted by neighbors who reveal hidden scores and betrayals.
Oksana initiates a full declassification of BCI system logs, exposing the extent to which scores were manipulated. The city is left to reckon with layers of constructed reality.
A movement for public reconciliation surges, creating open forums across the city. Factions fragment as citizens push to redefine what justice and accountability should look like post-BCI.
